string.text: It's been a week since the group, led by Bison, set out to find some kind of miraculous artifact...
I don't understand! Why do they need it? They know it won't end well...
Well, I'm almost there. Just a little bit more and I'll be at the location...
My search is over. I found the group, but Bison... damn he's dead.
I don't know why the mercenaries wanted to eliminate them, but I won't let this go.
I'll find whoever hired these thugs and avenge Bison and the guys.
